title: Fix immobile casters. My 1-0-0 Ziggs is literally being dived from 100% by 3-2-2 Fiora.
body:
There is literally nothing I can do. The enemy mid isn't even touching me, Fiora is just diving me solo from 100% because the turret is doing fuck all to her.

Fix this.

replies.body: Huh an "immobile" mage being dove by a diver. Who would have guessed.
Take him bot lane for the protection of a Support :3

Why not use your E to zone them from you or bait them under the turret and trap them with it?

Or if you stopped paying attention to the screen for a while and didn't notice her getting into range somehow, knock her away from you and you away from her with a W, then while still in midair dunk them with a Q for maximum bm.

Turret damage increases with each shot, so if they dive you and you stall them under it then it will melt them.
